tournaments.name: 3v3 Basketball Tournament
tournaments.description: Join us for an intense 3v3 basketball showdown! Bring your A-game and compete for the $800 prize pool!

tournaments.name: 3v3 Under 16 Basketball Tournament
tournaments.description: Join our exciting 3v3 tournament designed specifically for players 16 and under. Fast-paced games, friendly competition, and a chance to showcase your skills against peers. Sign ups close this Friday (August 22nd)
